title: What’s The Number One Difference Between GlaxoSmithKline plc And AstraZeneca plc?
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Sep 22, 2015, 01:29 BST - UK Markets open in 6 hrs 31 mins What’s The Number One Difference Between GlaxoSmithKline plc And AstraZeneca plc? By Owain Bennallack | Fool.co.uk – 13 hours ago 1,289.50 +4.50 
Investors often lump similar companies from the same sector together, and as a first pass at categorizing the thousands of companies out there, that's understandable. However a closer look under the hood of drugs giants GlaxoSmithKline (LSE: GSK)) and AstraZeneca (LSE: AZN) reveals two different strategies at play.

Owain Bennallack has no position in any shares mentioned. The Motley Fool UK has recommended GlaxoSmithKline. We Fools don't all hold the same opinions, but we all believe that considering a diverse range of insights makes us better investors.
